links.name: Plan with CPF
links.description: This guide helps you plan your CPF savings for retirement, housing, and healthcare. It offers step-by-step instructions to make the most of your CPF funds.

links.name: Growing Your Savings with CPF
links.description: Discover ways to enhance your CPF savings through various schemes and investment options. This resource provides tips on maximizing your returns.

links.name: Mortgage Calculator
links.description: Use this calculator to estimate your monthly housing loan repayments or determine the maximum loan amount you can afford. Simply input your loan amount, interest rate, and repayment period.

links.name: Education Loan Repayment Calculator
links.description: Calculate your education loan's repayment period or monthly instalments. Enter your loan amount, interest rate, and choose to calculate either the monthly instalment or the repayment duration.

links.name: CPF Housing Usage Calculator
links.description: Find out how much of your CPF Ordinary Account savings you can use for a property purchase. Provide details like your age, property type, and loan type to get accurate estimates.

links.name: Home Purchase Planner
links.description: Estimate your home purchase budget and housing loan amount, and see how it impacts your retirement. Input your income, savings, and monthly expenses to get a comprehensive plan.

links.name: Investing in Savings Bonds
links.description: Learn how to invest in Singapore Savings Bonds, including the benefits, application process, and interest rates.

links.name: Savings Bonds Calculator
links.description: Calculate your potential returns from Singapore Savings Bonds. Input the bond amount and tenure to see projected earnings.

links.name: Expense Manager
links.description: Manage your expenses by tracking your spending habits, setting budgets, and monitoring financial goals.

links.name: Buying Your First Home
links.description: A comprehensive guide to purchasing your first home, covering financial considerations, planning phases, and budgeting tips.

links.name: Home Buying Guide
links.description: Detailed information on the home buying process, including planning, purchasing costs, and financial considerations.

links.name: E-Learning
links.description: Access IRAS's e-learning resources to understand tax obligations, filing processes, and available reliefs.

links.name: Calculate Housing Budget
links.description: Check your housing budget with loan estimates from HDB and participating financial institutions. Input your CPF and cash savings to determine affordability.

links.name: Create Payment Plan
links.description: Calculate your payments at each stage of your flat buying journey. This tool helps you understand the financial commitments during the purchase process.
